name: TSOS
description:
In Active Development

"Save them. They are your only chance of survival. You don't know what you are stepping into..."

Lily screams and wakes up in a room she has never been in before. She doesn't remember anything at all, not even her own past. She needs to get out and remember her own self, but it won't be that easy.

Gamepad is recommended for better experience.

Made for HauntedPS1 "Summer Of Shivers" gamejam.

Controls

Keyboard: 

  • WASD - Movement; 
  • Left Shift - Run; 
  • E - Action/Confirm; 
  • Tab - Aim; 
  • I - Inventory.

Gamepad:

  • D-pad - Movement;
  • Square - Run;
  • X - Action/Confirm;
  • R1 - Aim;
  • Start - Inventory.
Credits

Art, Animation, UI sounds - KaPu

Art - Morgis

Art - Neco Games
